alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 3:55PM PST until December 24 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow and sleet accumulations generally an inch or less and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Kettle Falls, Clark Fork, Tiger, Eastport, Chewelah, Ione, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Orin-Rice Road, Fruitland, Colville, Metaline Falls, Priest River, Newport, Sandpoint, Athol, Bonners Ferry, Springdale-Hunters Road, Northport, Deer Park, Metaline, and Flowery Trail Road. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
